additional_info:
Storeroom, Internet, Telephone, Cable-TV, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 The private house is being sold in Chughureti district, Senaki str. with 515m2 garden with various kinds of fruit, flowers and decorative plants. The house is not newly built but is clean, with all communications, central heat, telephone, internet, commercial TV and water reservoir for uninterrupted water supply. There are the 6 rooms in the house and among them - three bedrooms, big cellar with chimney, two porches with view on city; there is the garage and parking place for two more cars in the garden. Price: 80000$ Contact: 599 213225
